alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Jefferson; Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:07AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Green Lake, western Fond du Lac, Columbia, northeastern Dane, Marquette, northwestern Jefferson and western Dodge Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Portage to near Fall River to near Deerfield. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Sun Prairie, Watertown, Beaver Dam, Waupun, Portage, Ripon, Windsor, Berlin, Columbus, Marshall, Waterloo, Juneau, Deforest, Cottage Grove, Poynette, Pardeeville, Randolph, Fall River and Montello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Jefferson; Marquette
